medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started last night at 10 pm while the patient was on the airplane. It was very severe and woke her up from sleep. Initially, the pain was more periumbilical and transitioned to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) later in the night. The patient also reported new fevers, chills, night sweats, and loss of appetite. No nausea, emesis, diarrhea, or dysuria were noted.
medical_history.family_history: No history of inflammatory bowel disease or cancer
